HearingSchedule.HearingVenue: Birmingham Civil and Family Justice Centre

Questionnaire.SelfTestQuestion1: Could you see yourself on the screen in the camera window?
Questionnaire.SelfTestQuestion2: Could you see the bar moving when you spoke?
Questionnaire.IndividualQuestion: Is there anything you'd like the court to take into account when it decides which type of hearing will be suitable?
Questionnaire.RepresentativeQuestion: Is there anything you'd like the court to know that could affect this hearing taking place by video?
Questionnaire.UnansweredQuestion: Could you see and hear the video clearly?
